title: qqwx
author: qqwx
created_time: March 16, 2023, 11:21:22 AMLast edit: May 04, 2023, 04:52:02 AM by qqwx
content: ‚≠ï‚≠ï‚≠ï QRT UPDATE - 3 MAY ‚≠ï‚≠ï‚≠ïTeam agreed to pay all participants Please check the sheet, Your name -- https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/162z94smQRIG7d2Fni3ZZUK4mT0_jCpJJkbId-Cs7-8M/edit?usp=sharingCreate https://qrtwallet.com/ within 1 week (Til 10 may) with same email which on sheet.Team will distribute to all.Create wallet on https://qrtwallet.com very soon with the email which you used on AppCreate wallet on https://qrtwallet.com very soon with the email which you used on AppCreate wallet on https://qrtwallet.com very soon with the email which you used on App  WEBSITE  TWITTER TELEGRAM CHANNEL YOUTUBE   Qrkita is The First Online Qris Platform! We Are First Online Qris Platform In Indonesia. Qrkita Provides The Latest Technology For Online And Offline Merchant To Boost Their Sales. Qrkita Is Intended To facilitate Non-Cash Transactions, Encourage Financial Inclusion, Promote MSMEs, So That In The End It Can Encourage Economic Growth. All Merchant Can Make Transactions Using QR Not Only Wholesalers But Also Small Traders Such As Meatball Sellers, Vegetable Sellers And Others Throughout Indonesia. Our Initial Token Offering / ITO Crowfunding Platform Based On Existing Project As A Bridge Between Fiat And Crypto Community All Around The World. And Finally, QRT Will Become A Global Merchant Reward Currency That Liquid And Expandable With Unlimited Possibilites Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Tuesday/Wednesday Forum time); Otherwise you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsDear Bounty Hunters, We delightfully announcing the Qrkita bounty program has been launched. Qrkita Official Bounty Program in order to reward its supporters with QRT tokens. $20K in QRT Tokens will be allocated to the Bounty Pool. ¬†We distribute QRT reward in each participants account in https://qrtwallet.com, then they can choose to withdraw or join QRT membership to get extra rewards up to 35% in QRT. Week 1 (16 Mar - 22 Mar).......... END Week 2 (23 Mar - 29 Mar).......... END Week 3 (30 Mar ¬†- 05 Apr).......... END Bounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: LuckQRT App campaign (30%)üåç Section B: CMC Campaign (10%)üåç Section C: Twitter Campaign (20%)üåç Section D: Instagram Campaign (10%)üåç Section E: Youtube Campaign (10%)üåç Section F: Article Campaign (10%)üåç Section G: Tiktok Campaign (10%)Mandatory Rules‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group; & Telegram Channel;‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group  &  Chanel;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter;‚ñ†Must follow us on Instagram;‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Wednesday 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostBitcointalk username: Telegram username: Which Campaign you joined: LuckQRT Email address: [/b]LuckQRT App Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE CMC Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Instagram Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Youtube Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Tiktok Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Rules of LuckQRT App Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group & Telegram Channel; If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Download LuckQRT Android Apps from Playstore CLICK HERE‚ñ†Post a Positive Review on Playstore;‚ñ†Share a screenshot that you have done the task (Only Form Fillup).‚ñ†10% Reward Apps Install and Review & 20% for complete minimum point to witdrawal.Rules of CMC Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group & Telegram Channel; If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Create Account on https://coinmarketcap.com and Follow & Add QRT to your CoinMarketCap watchlist CLICK HERE‚ñ†Post a Positive Review on Playstore;‚ñ†Share a screenshot that you have done the task (Only Form Fillup). ‚ñ†Must share/repost 3 times in a week by your CMC account with $QRT #QRT #qrkita #coinmarketcap #bitcoin #ethereum #bnb #BSC #BEP20;Rules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with $QRT #QRT #qrkita #coinmarketcap #bitcoin #ethereum #bnb #BSC #BEP20;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Instagram Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Instagram ;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Share/likes/Comment 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with $QRT #QRT #qrkita #coinmarketcap #bitcoin #ethereum #bnb #BSC #BEP20;‚ñ†Your Instagram account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Youtube:‚ñ†Subscriber Qrkita Official Youtube Channel  ‚ñ†Minimum 100 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word Qrkita Exchange. And Use hashtag $QRT #QRT #qrkita #coinmarketcap #bitcoin #ethereum #bnb #BSC #BEP20;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Instagram Link and also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 4 video will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, LuckQRT Email address in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Rules of Tiktok:‚ñ†Minimum 100 Followers/Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Video minimum length 20 Seconds;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word Qrkita Exchange and Use hashtag $QRT #QRT #qrkita #coinmarketcap #bitcoin #ethereum #bnb #BSC #BEP20;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Instagram Link, also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, LuckQRT Email address in Video DescriptionTiktok Video Rewards#Rewards Depend on Quality and how unique this is.Rules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Instagram Link, also Telegram link;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, LuckQRT Email address in Video DescriptionContent Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 Stakes SPREADSHEET / Participants List[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team and Distribution will be done. I am the only bounty manager of this project. I am not responsible for the bad things about this project. I have the right to change any rules of this project.]
